original_text: for the man found the young woman out in the country, and though the betrothed woman screamed, there was no one to rescue her.
korean_text: 남자가 처녀를 들에서 만난 까닭에 그 약혼한 처녀가 소리질러도 구원할 자가 없었음이니라

sentences.original_text: for the man found the young woman
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남자가 그 젊은 여자를 발견했으니

sentences.original_text: and though the betrothed woman screamed
there was no one to rescue her
